attributes.action: Change the official title of Queen Elizabeth II to Queen Elizabeth the Great.
attributes.additional_details: We should recognise the great service she gave to the nation by ensuring history will remember just how remarkable of a person she was. Make her official title as great as she was.
attributes.background: She was a great lady who lead by example maintaing dignity at all times; was a monarch longer than any other in our history; embraced major changes in history, society & technology; while at the same time being a constance factor in our lives. She was very much respected around the world.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for a monarch to be given a particular title.
